room_title: Escape room "The Interview" by Puzzle Theory in Hartford
room_description:
Mad Scientist Dr. X. is recruiting lab assistants. Is your team worthy in the eyes of Dr. Xavier? Dr. X's peculiar methods for interviews involve hiring large groups of highly intelligent individuals who work well together toward a common goal. No prior laboratory work required to be hired. Dr. X believes that the best employees are ones who can work under pressure while still thinking critically and maintaining strong teamwork.
Dr. X's lab assistants are unpaid and not guaranteed working hours. Why does Dr. X need so many lab assistants? What is he planning?
